Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
PREMIUM OFFICE SPACE
221 Dawson is a ±40,058 square-foot Class A multi-tenant building in Columbia’s Northeast Submarket offering a professional office setting featuring ample parking,recent common area upgrades,and great Interstate accessibility.

•Substantial Parking
221 Dawson offers substantial surface lot parking at no additional cost to accommodate dense users

•Recent Improvements
Common area improvements include restroom and lobby renovations,and new LED fixtures throughout building

•Turn-Key Office Space
Available office space is turn-key with existing furniture in place

P R O P E R T Y O V E R V I E W
+ ±5,000 - ±20,948 rentable square feet available for lease on the ground floor
+Space is partially furnished
+Potential for exterior building signage
+Substantial on-site secured parking at no additional cost
+Professional office setting,including outdoor common areas with seating
+Close proximity to area amenities,and within 15 minutes of Downtown Columbia
+Great Interstate accessibility via I-77 and I-20,as well as from Trenholm Road and
Two Notch Road

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
• Full Floor Plug & Play Office
The entire third floor is available and was recently upfitted and furnished in 2018 and is ready for a quick move-in

P R O P E R T Y   F E A T U R E S
+ Entire third floor available fully furnished
+ ±21,295 rentable square feet available for sublease
+ Master lease expires 7/31/2023
+ Lease rate negotiable
+ Ample surface lot parking at no additional cost at a 6/1,000 parking ratio
+ Access to a generator, depending on the user
+ Campus-like setting in the SCRA Business Park and surrounded by notable companies, including Blue Cross Blue Shield, Rite Dose, AECOM, Pure Fishing, and Colite International
+ Conveniently located one mile from I-77 and just minutes from the Killian Road Retail Corridor, offering great amenities, including shopping, dining, professional services, and entertainment

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The Ikon Building is an ±88,000 square foot Class A office building in the South Carolina Research Authority Business Park in Columbia’s fast-growing Northeast submarket. Quick, easy access to I-77 and the Killian Road retail corridor makes 7 Technology Circle a convenient & desirable location.

• Premium Office Space
Class A office space with newly completed & upcoming property improvements, including lobby renovations, lighting, signage, and landscaping upgrades

• Campus Setting
Tenants enjoy a beautifullly landscaped and well maintained park setting with a lake, ample trees, and an 18-hole tournament quality golf course

• Full Floor Plug & Play Office
The entire third floor is available and was recently upfitted and furnished in 2018 and is ready for a quick move-in

P R O P E R T Y   F E A T U R E S
+ Entire third floor available fully furnished
+ ±21,295 rentable square feet available for sublease
+ Master lease expires 7/31/2023
+ Lease rate negotiable
+ Ample surface lot parking at no additional cost at a 6/1,000 parking ratio
+ Access to a generator, depending on the user
+ Campus-like setting in the SCRA Business Park and surrounded by notable companies, including Blue Cross Blue Shield, Rite Dose, AECOM, Pure Fishing, and Colite International
+ Conveniently located one mile from I-77 and just minutes from the Killian Road Retail Corridor, offering great amenities, including shopping, dining, professional services, and entertainment

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 3400 Forest Drive is a mixed use property consisting +164,607 square feet of Class B office space. The site is contiguous to Richland Mall, a regional shopping mall, offering direct access to numerous amenities, including professional services, shopping, dining, and entertainment. 3400 Forest Drive is situated in the popular Forest Acres area with easy access via I-77, I-20, and Hwy 277.

Fontaine Business Center is a premier, centrally located suburban office complex in Columbia’s popular Northeast submarket. The park is in close proximity to numerous amenities and offers remarkable accessibility and interstate visibility.
Park Highlights:
• Professional park setting features a fitness path, garden plaza, and a 2.4 acre lake
• Building maintenance engineer and security personnel on-site
• Substantial surface parking at no additional cost
• Weekly farmers market and food vendors on-site
• Numerous amenities nearby, including shopping, dining, and professional services
• Great access and visibility along I-277
• Convenient to and within minutes of Downtown Columbia, I-77, I-20, and I-26

Columbia's Premier Office Tower
1221 Main is the finest office tower in the Columbia market, featuring premium finishes, full-service bank branch, Hall's Chophouse fine dining, and 360° views of beautiful Columbia. The area’s most popular dining, entertainment, shopping, and services are just steps away.

Opportunity Overview
- ±19,527 rentable square feet available for sublease
- Full 12th floor available
- Class A space in excellent condition
- Features floor to ceiling windows throughout for abundant natural light and scenic views of the SC State House, Main Street, and the Congaree Vista
- Suite features private offices, workstation area, conference & training rooms, work room, reception, break area, restrooms, and elevator lobby
- Asking Sublease Rate: $28.00/RSF, Full Service

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Full Floor Sublease Opportunity in Columbia's Premier Office Tower

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Located at the heart of downtown Columbia
Adjacent to the South Carolina State House
New tenant lounge with Smart Market
New building conference room with technology and kitchenette

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the heart of downtown Columbia,the Capitol Center offers the ideal location directly adjacent to the South Carolina State Capitol Complex,Main Street,and the Congaree Vista. As the tallest office building in South Carolina,it offers spectacular panoramic views of downtown Columbia,The Congaree,Saluda,and Broad Rivers,Lake Murray,and the University of South Carolina.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Capitol Center is a Class A office tower of approximately 460,020 square feet of premium office space. The Capitol Center is Columbia's premier office building,offering amenities such as a new tenant lounge with Smart Market,newly renovated conference center,state-of-the-art tenant fitness center,24-hour security service,on-site property management,and the Capital City Club,a private dining club on the 25th floor.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Up to ±6,834 contiguous SF available with Main Street visibility & access.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CONVENIENCE IN THE HEART OF COLUMBIA
1333 Main offers excellent access in a prominent downtown location. Less than two blocks from the South Carolina State House,1333 Main is in the heart of the CBD and walkable to many of the best dining,shopping,and entertainment amenities Columbia has to offer.

Easy Parking
1333 Main offers ample parking in its adjacent surface lot and owned parking garage on Assembly Street with gated access.

Professional Management & Security
The property is professionally managed on-site,including a building engineer and 24/7 staffed security.

Modern Space
1333 Main has been beautifully updated with modern finishes and large building conference center,with future improvements and additional amenities planned.

PRIME MAIN STREET RETAIL OPPORTUNITY
Available ground floor suites can be combined to offer up to ±6,834 rentable square feet of space on Main Street that is ideal for retailers,restaurants,and professional services. The full-length window line provides unrivaled Main Street presence and visibility.

PRIME OFFICE OPPORTUNITY IN THE HEART OF THE VISTA
1005 Gervais/1200 Park offers up to ±4,975 rentable square feet of unique office space in the heart of Columbia’s popular historic Vista District. Located on the second floor, this charming space features abundant natural light, hardwood flooring, exposed brick, and high deco ceilings. This highly desirable location offers immediate access to the area’s best shopping, dining, and entertainment.

Congaree Building is a ±32,964 square foot multi-tenant office building situated in an ideal CBD location within the popular Vista District with excellent visibility. The building offers immediate access to I-126,and is in close proximity to nearby amenities,including shopping,dining,entertainment,and professional services.

- Ample surface parking at no additional cost
- Tenant improvements negotiable

Common.Brochures.Common.BrochureName: Vista Business Center at 500 Taylor Flyer.pdf

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- ±8,000- 64,500 rentable square feet available
- Full building & full floors (±16,000 RSF each) available
- Substantial surface parking at no additional cost
- Excellent location in Columbia’s popular Vista district with high visibility & great accessibility
- Immediate access to I-126 and the area’s extensive interstate system
- Close proximity to many amenities, including shopping, dining, entertainment, lodging, and professional services
- Surrounded by new & upcoming mixed-use developments
- Major interior & exterior capital improvements recently completed, including new roof, HVAC, exterior lighting, landscaping, signage, and common area flooring, fixtures, and finishes

Dutch Center is a ±100,059 square foot Class B office building with excellent access via multiple interstates and offering numerous amenities in close proximity,including shopping,dining,and professional services. The building is newly
renovated with upgraded finishes,fixtures,and decor. Dutch Center also offers ample surface parking and excellent tenant amenities,such as conference rooms,a fitness center,outdoor terraces,and vending.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: Dutch Center New Interior Lobby GL

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- ±200,000 square foot multi-tenant office building

- Parking ratio can accommodate 6.38 per 1,000 rentable sq. ft. Property includes 4+ unimproved acres available for additional parking, if needed 

- Full energy redundancy via multiple power feeds, as well as on-site generators

- Redundant fiber optic telecom feeds into building

- Pylon signage opportunity available with interstate visibility

- Excellent interstate visibility (134,700 VPD) and accessibility fronting I-26 at the I-26/I-20 interchange

BUILDING AMENITIES:

- Building security consists of card system, closed circuit camera feed, and on-site security personnel

- Newly renovated lobby, elevator, restrooms, and fitness center

- Common conference room, break area, and dock high loading area are available to tenants at no additional charge

PROPERTY OVERVIEW
Crown Pointe is a Class A ±35,838 square foot single-story multi-tenant office building in St. Andrews,Columbia’s most sought after submarket. The building features premium finishes,ample parking,redundant power systems,and professional building management.

•Premium Office Space
Crown Pointe boasts beautiful finishes,including fieldstone & brick exterior details and a travertine lobby with fireplace

•Top Technology
Dual power grid and redundant fiber optics are constructed specifically to support high-tech users and maintain continuity of business

•Easy Access
Adjacent to the junction of I-26 and I-20,Crown Pointe is just minutes from Downtown Columbia,Columbia Metropolitan Airport(CAE),and the Harbison retail corridor

P R O P E R T Y F E A T U R E S
+ One suite available: ±2,581 rentable square feet
+ Ample surface lot parking at no additional cost
+ Redundant power systems and fiber optics to support data centers
+ Loading dock and garage storage area available
+ Common area improvements underway
+ Excellent access from the I-26/I-20 interchange
+ Conveniently located just minutes from Downtown Columbia,the Harbison retail corridor and Lake Murray,offering abundant amenities,including shopping,dining,
professional services,entertainment,and recreation

Common.Brochures.Common.BrochureName: Center Point V Flyer - 1370 Browning Rd.pdf

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Center Point V is a ±19,425 square foot multi-tenant office building within the Center Point Office Park. Center Point Office Park is a premier office complex within Saint Andrews, Columbia’s largest suburban submarket, and is strategically located at the
intersection of Interstates 20 and 26. In addition to its central location, Center Point V provides easy access to downtown Columbia, Columbia Metropolitan Airport (CAE), and many amenities, including restaurants, hotels, and the largest retail district
in the greater Columbia area.

• ±2,331 - ±2,722 rentable square foot office suite
available for lease
• Tenant improvements negotiable
• Ample surface parking at no additional cost
